text: It is certainly not too bombastic, but that doesn't mean it doesn't portray powerful emotions. I have never played this game, so I don't have nostalgia goggles for this song either, but I find it both intense in its own way and very tragic sounding. I don't really agree with you saying it's "below par", but of course, if you don't like it, feel free to not like it by all means!

text:
@HypnotizedByTv 
Sakurai, the guy who directs the series,didn't make this game or dreamland 3. Those two, along with dreamland 2 and Star Stacker, were directed by Shinichi Shimomura. Those games have a different cast of recurring characters and a different abilities system. They also are a bit slower paces and more likely to have an eldritch abomination for a final boss.
